lead_paragraph: Oklahoma State suspended linebacker Chris Collins Jr. for the rest of the season yesterday after he pleaded guilty to a felony aggravated sexual assault charge. A jury Wednesday in New Boston, Tex., recommended five years of probation for Collins, who pleaded guilty Tuesday to the aggravated sexual assault of a 12-year-old girl. He is to be sentenced Dec. 10.
